But it requires you to uninstall your existing uPlay, install it and fuck it up.
Basically, if you don't have any owned Ubi-game installed that you wanna play - go ahead this crack is awesome.
If you DO have another ubi-game installed that you actually own... Yeah, well... Pass.

I followed all the steps, and it kinda felt legit so could have been something I've done wrong, but now  I cant enter the game. When I open the game in uplay it comes "Unable to start the game. Please check that your game has been installed correctly. If the problem persists contact UbiSoft Support".

Anyone got a fix for this?
Please someone come up with a fix, I really want to play again :/
Unable to start the game. Please check that your game has been installed correctly same problem here.
@Jakmalmo Yes, I have the same message. Can anyone help? Will you upload that "scene release"?

OK guys it's working now. What I did was to completely reinstall the game, then follow the tutorial, then open the FC3updater.exe and update the game. After that I went online on Uplay and started the game which worked :]
when you press the game & not open is because is cracked......... that's why the folder brings original files JUST REPLACE ;) WORKS awesome coop & multiplayer
I can't create an account or login. It says "We are unable to create your account right now as Ubisoft server is unavailable". Any help..?

@N3xS Go to C:\WindowsSystem32etc and delete host file. Should work after that.

@Jakmalmo It won't update the game for me. Error pops up. Help?
@N3xS Go to C:WindowsSystem32driversetc and delete host file. Should work after that.

Now my game is in freaking German.... co-op/mp works but now it's all in German. Does anyone know how to fix this? The reloaded language selector forces offline mode so that will not work.
@pkicyris69 IN THE STEP THAT YOU GOT TO OPEN FC3_Registry.reg AND YOU CHANGE THE INSTALL DIRECTORY THERE IS A LINE THAT SAYS language JUST PUT ENGLISH OR ANY LANGUAGE AND THAT'S IT ;)
